physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Prolactin level: 55 ng/ml; pituitary tumor ruled out by imaging.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: After switching to aripiprazole, prolactin levels returned to normal range within 1 week.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: No signs of depression; the patient is overweight at 160 pounds.
Erratic menstrual periods and previously fluctuating prolactin levels (30 to 50 ng/ml) during antipsychotic treatment.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Menstrual periods became erratic and usually stopped on higher dosage of pimozide.
